entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023
